item.title: RS and RA contours with ggplot
item.description: This post shows how to scrape the current MLB standings and generate a graph of runs scored and runs allowed contours. I will facet the graph according to division, but still compute the contours using all the data. The trick for making this work is to replicate the data, setting a flag for each division, and then using alpha and size aesthetics to hide the non-relevant data.
